Configure Project/Event Triggers

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | Event Triggers tab) to execute an administrator-specified program when a specified Serena ChangeMan Version Manager processing event occurs (such as checking in a workfile).

Field Descriptions

Event Triggers list Select the event for which you want to define an event trigger from the list. The right pane displays a list of available options, which varies depending on the event you select. If an event trigger has been defined for an event, a green diamond appears to the left of the event in the event list.
Before/After
(Only for All Events)		 Enter the path and the name of the event trigger file or click Browse to select one.
Unconditional
(Only for Check In)		 Enter the path and the name of the event trigger file or click Browse to select one.
Before Enter the path and the name of the event trigger file or click Browse to select one.
After Enter the path and the name of the event trigger file or click Browse to select one.
Event Information button ( ) Specify a command-line macro to pass event information to the event trigger.
Usage Displays detail about the event trigger selected in the list and explains when the trigger executes.
Show Assigned Triggers Only Select this check box to display only the events that have defined triggers in the Event Triggers list.
